title: Runner-up in Bank of Canada Governors Challenge
preview: This fall,I led the Dalhousie University team to a runner-up finish among 26 Canadian universities in the 2023 Bank of Canada Governor's Challenge.
fullText:
This fall, I led the Dalhousie University team to a runner-up finish among 26 Canadian universities in the 2023 Bank of Canada Governor's Challenge.

During this project, I conducted in-depth analysis of Canadian economic data using data mining techniques, time series regression models, and forecasting methodologies. I presented our evidence-based policy recommendations to a panel of Bank of Canada economists.
